query:
-- Verificar registros com quantity=0 nos endereços problemáticos
SELECT 
  i.id,
  i.productId,
  p.name as productName,
  i.locationId,
  wl.code as locationCode,
  i.batch,
  i.quantity,
  i.reservedQuantity,
  i.createdAt,
  i.updatedAt
FROM inventory i
LEFT JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id
LEFT JOIN products p ON i.productId = p.id
WHERE wl.code IN ('H01-02-01', 'H01-02-02', 'H01-02-03')
ORDER BY wl.code, i.productId;
